name: a06fc8e7-2af5-58e1-bcb8-017da9e91f40
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at BEO Moussala, Bulgaria (20070330 - 20170101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at BEO Moussala, Bulgaria (20070330 - 20170101)
